attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe broadcasting licence application demands mandatory frequent news bulletins inclusion.Is  this political control exerted to perpetuate a platform for spinat our expense?
There exist numerous news media sources-easily accessable- even 24hr wrap around.
Repetition is torturous & mind numbing.
Every 30min. - 48x a day!!! EVERY 15 MIN. at peak!! I tune out to avoid bulletins & thus the ads too.
(hey sponsors-wise up)Vital editorial topics, are rudely swept aside by strict scheduling to allow  probably trite celeb. biased heresay & conjecture!News should mean NEW! 
Its free because its for their benefit, not ours.I tune in for companionship & end up frustrated & depressed by over exsposure! Whosoever is responsible for this diabolical inconsideration   should be exposed.PLEASE NAME & SHAME THIS ABUSER & AWARD AN ASBO!
G.Orwin '1984' Big Brother is watching, BUT do we HAVE to reciprocate?
